short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control the boldness of text on any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:

* Easily adjust font-weight on any webpage.
* User-friendly interface with simple controls.

Features:
* Real-time font-weight adjustment.
* Save preferred settings.
* Enhance readability.
* Compatible with all websites.

How to Use:
* Install from the Chrome Web Store.
* Click the extension icon.
* Adjust the font-weight slider.

Support & Requests:

Contact: yardenporat@gmail.com
